App_name: What beautiful traits did your children inherit from YOU?
Result:
You are a fighter. You have
                  fought for your happiness
                  and never gave up. This
                  amazing trait has been
                  passed down to your
                  children. They are strong,
                  resilient and have the energy
                  to succeed.

You have a big heart and
                  an even bigger personality.
                  These wonderful
                  attributes have made your
                  own kids confident, kind
                  and full of energy! They
                  will go very far in life.

Your strong spirit and
                  unbreakable will are truly
                  impressive. Your children
                  have inherited these
                  powerful attributes. They
                  know how to work hard, keep
                  smiling and never, ever, give up.

You are a compassionate and
                  wise soul. You try not to
                  judge others and are a
                  natural problem solver. This
                  calming influence has been
                  passed on to your children.
                  They use their intelligence,
                  not their emotions.

It's well known you would do
                  anything for a friend. This
                  selflessness has been passed
                  down to your children. They
                  have big hearts and are
                  naturally caring,
                  compassionate and kind.
                  Simply beautiful!
Result_share:
Incredible! Your children are very, very lucky to have such an amazing parent and inspiration in their lives. You have given everything to ensure your children are happy and secure. Your love has helped turn them into the wonderful people we see today. Good job!
                    Don't forget to SHARE this with other parents today!
